messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Melaleuca
messages.msgSnippet: Kandice, I am a health minded person but have not been very effective w/ influencing people to try things that works for me. Do you have to do shows? Sign so
messages.messageBody:
Kandice,
I am a health minded person but have not been very effective w/
influencing people to try things that works for me.
Do you have to do shows? Sign so many people up per time period?
I do know about Mel. b/c the private school my son used to attend sold
it.
I love the products but just am shakey on the business part.
I have always wanted a home business esp health related.
Can you give me more info?
Thanks!


KIDS4GOD Learning Co.
~\o/~\o/~\o/~\o/~
Jolene Goens
"Heal me, O Lord, And I shall be healed..." Jer 17:14

On Mon, 21 Aug 2000 19:43:21 -0400 (EDT) Kandice Crockett
<naturalmom@...> writes:
> LOL! I am in Melaleuca too! I am earning enough in my third month
> to
> retire my husband from his job in a couple months!
>
> In our business we show people how to earn a great income part-time
> from
> home along side their regular job or while they stay home with their
> babies.
>
> Blessings to you,
>
> Kandice
> If I could show you how to make $500-$800+ mo. part-time at home
> with no selling, inventory,or huge
> start-up cost, would you like to hear about it? Not Amway! ;)
